education.description: CS61A - Structure and Interpretation of Computer Programs, 61B - Data Stuctures, 61C - Great Ideas in Computer Architecture (Machine Structures), CS170 - Efficient Algorithms and Intractable Problems, MATH53 - Multivariable Calculus, MATH110 - Linear Algebra, EE16B - Designing Information Devices and Systems II
CS1A - Object Oriented Programming Methodologies in Java, CS1B - Intermediate Software Design in Java, CS1C - Advanced Data Structures & Algorithms in Java, CS10 - Computer Architecture

work.title: Full Stack Developer Intern
work.description: Worked with a small team to create a travelshare app for web and mobile, created react implementation from scratch. Implemented React / React-Redux / React Router to create fluid transitions with responsive ui, connected with Firebase backend, security, and hosting, token based authentication.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
